name: Javid Aslanov
title: Lead Infrasture Engineer
technicalSkills: Amazon Web Services, Kubernetes, Docker Containers, Kafka
aboutMe:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect working as a Infrastructure Engineer with the main
focus on building, supporting, and running new infrastructure solutions for multi-VPC
AWS Cloud environment to keep our platform reliable and enable developers to release
new services with minimal lead time to production.

workExperience.title: Lead Infrastructure Engineer
tasks:
Led data migration projects from several MySQL instances to
AWS RDS Aurora Cluster with minimal downtime as well as from the old S3 bucket to a new one with live
cross account replication enabled.

Designed and Implemented multi-connection site-to-site VPN between the office
network and AWS Cloud + Transit Gateways.

Worked on a comprehensive network redesign project within the AWS infrastructure (e.g. NAT Gateways, VPC Endpoint Services and etc.), resulting in a substantial reduction in operational costs and the optimization of data transfer processes. Key achievements include successfully implementing changes to multiple components, leading to a streamlined network architecture that efficiently minimized extraneous data transfers.
Worked on creation of financial roadmap for infrastructure cost accountability and optimisation.

Implemented Terraform Pull Request automation tool called Atlantis to allow developers to manage their cloud infrastructure as code that decreased their dependency on the Infrastructure team 25%/day.,

Researched and prepared proof of concepts on several topics such as AWS WAF &
API Gateway, Terraform Drift Detection, Kubernetes Policy Management via Kyverno,
etc.
Introduced project prioritization and fundamental planning methods for Infrastructure team resulting in an increase in delivery capacity of team.
Participated in interview processes of new infrastructure engineers.
workExperience.techStack: Amazon Web Services, Kubernetes, Docker Containers, ArgoCD, Terraform/Terragrunt/Atlantis, Jenkins, Azure AD, Python, Golang, Kafka (MSK), Prometheus, Grafana, Git, Backstage.io

workExperience.title: DevOps Engineer
tasks: Worked on migrating Django services running on Python 2 to Python 3.
Participated in development of new build system in Gradle using Kotlin programming language that replaces old one.

Migrated a critical repository manager service from old unmanageable infrastructure to AWS Elastic Beanstalk. Main task was to research and implement migration strategy that enables migration of ~2TBs of data with minimal outage of service availability.
Implemented a monitoring solution for new repository manager service that helps to see insights of usage of service using Prometheus and Grafana.
Worked on critical AWS RDS database engine upgrades..
Researched and implemented rightsizing of AWS RDS databases to utilize proper instance types to achieve cost effectiveness while keeping application requirements in mind.
workExperience.techStack: Amazon Web Services, Kubernetes, Docker Containers, Buildkit, Git, Python (Flask, Django), Kotlin, Prometheus, Grafana, FluentD, Ansible, Terraform.

workExperience.title: DevOps Engineer for Network Automation
tasks: Built and deployed applications according to microservice architecture for horizontally scaled systems.
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines for code deployments using Gitlab CI.
Delivered automation solutions through the software development life cycle that reduced manual effort and helped to avoid possible human misconfigurations for large scale network systems.
Designed and developed network device onboarding process that reduces the effort and time for new device commissioning by minimum 40%.
Developed APIs using Python to integrate with internal services over modern authentication and authorization techniques such as Microsoft Azure Active Directory.,
workExperience.techStack:
Python (Flask, Django), Ansible (Core, AWX), Linux (RHEL), SQL (MySQL,
SQL Server), NoSQL (MongoDB), Docker Containers, Openshift Container Platform,
AngularJS, NodeJS, JavaScript, C#, Cisco, Juniper, Git.

workExperience.title: Web Application Developer
tasks: Designed and developed both the frontend and backend of web based applications.
Provided long term support for released websites by adding new features or fixing discovered problems with minimal user impact.
Successfully led the development of an educational web project from formulating project scope to the deployment of the final product.
workExperience.techStack:
PHP (Frameworks: Laravel, YII2), MySQL, AWS (EC2, RDS, S3),
JavaScript, Python (Django).

workExperience.title: Programming Instructor
tasks: Designed comprehensive syllabi and engaging quizzes for lectures, fostering a dynamic and interactive learning experience.
Imparted the fundamentals of programming to school students of varying levels, nurturing their skills and passion for technology.
Mentored and trained students to participate in national and international coding competitions, helping them to achieve their full potential.

freelanceExperience.title: Python Developer (Intern)
tasks: Prepared architectural models of open source ERP Systems.
Analyzed and compared functionalities of ERP systems with company’s requirements and developed modules for ERP systems accordingly.
Prepared technical tasks for the automation of management systems.
freelanceExperience.techStack: Python, PostgreSQL, Git, XML, Bash, PHP
